feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2024-03-28: v. 8.24.2 available
entry.content: A bug during the aggregated events export under certain conditions was fixed
entry.summary: A bug during the aggregated events export under certain conditions was fixed

entry.title: 2024-01-23: v. 8.22.17 available
entry.content: Fix various bugs and introduce an improved zoom function
entry.summary: Fix various bugs and introduce an improved zoom function

entry.title: 2024-01-18: Big bug in v. 8.22.16!
entry.content: Current version rollback to 8.22.14 wating for fix
entry.summary: Current version rollback to 8.22.14 waiting for fix

entry.title: 2023-10-17: BORIS joined Bluesky @boris-behav-obs.bsky.social
entry.content: I hope to see you there!
entry.summary: I hope to see you there!

entry.title: 2023-06-01: BORIS v.8.20 is available
entry.content: v.8.20 available. Geometric measurements function was improved. it is now possible to save the frames with measurements and to draw polylines
entry.summary: v.8.20 available. Geometric measurements function was improved: it is now possible to save the frames with measurements and to draw polylines
